printed_text:
[click]: Flip this identity.
The Runner pays 1[credit] more when spending a [click] to remove a tag (not through a card ability).
Flip side:
[click]: Flip this identity.
You may pay 2[credit] fewer when spending a [click] to trash a resource (not through a card ability).
stripped_printed_text: click: Flip this identity. The Runner pays 1 credit more when spending a click to remove a tag (not through a card ability). Flip side: click: Flip this identity. You may pay 2 credits fewer when spending a click to trash a resource (not through a card ability).

flavor: Nothing but the Truth.
printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may play 1 current from HQ or Archives (paying its play cost).
stripped_printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may play 1 current from HQ or Archives (paying its play cost).

flavor: We're ready to start the fire.
printed_text: The first time each turn you rez an advertisement, the Runner loses 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you rez an advertisement, the Runner loses 1 credit.

flavor: You had your shot, and you blew it.
printed_text:
[click]: Shuffle 15 Minutes into R&D. The Corp can trigger this ability while 15 Minutes is in the Runner's score area.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: click: Shuffle 15 Minutes into R&D. The Corp can trigger this ability while 15 Minutes is in the Runner's score area. Limit 1 per deck.

flavor: "The trick isn't software, it's hardware. Cyberspace is a collection of physical machines. If we control the machines, we control it all." -KR Kane, "Our Future"
printed_text: All tracer ice have +1 strength. The base trace strength of each subroutine is increased by 1.
stripped_printed_text: All tracer ice have +1 strength. The base trace strength of each subroutine is increased by 1.

flavor: "Nobody ever lost a dollar by underestimating the taste of the public." -Phineas Taylor Barnum
printed_text: All assets gain advertisement.
stripped_printed_text: All assets gain advertisement.

flavor: "Yes and No."
printed_text:
If Quantum Predictive Model is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
If the Runner is tagged when Quantum Predictive Model is accessed, add it to your score area.
stripped_printed_text: If Quantum Predictive Model is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. If the Runner is tagged when Quantum Predictive Model is accessed, add it to your score area.

flavor: "Live from New Angeles, this is Lily Lockwell."
printed_text: When you rez Lily Lockwell, draw 3 cards. [click], remove 1 tag: Search R&D for an operation, reveal it, and shuffle the rest of R&D. Add the operation to the top of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez Lily Lockwell, draw 3 cards. click, remove 1 tag: Search R&D for an operation, reveal it, and shuffle the rest of R&D. Add the operation to the top of R&D.

printed_text:
If News Team is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses News Team, he or she must either take 2 tags or add News Team to his or her score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: If News Team is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses News Team, he or she must either take 2 tags or add News Team to his or her score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.

flavor: No one can bury a story better.
printed_text:
[click]: Draw 1 card from the bottom of R&D.
[trash]: Search R&D or Archives for an agenda and reveal it. Shuffle the rest of R&D if you searched it. Add the agenda to the bottom of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: click: Draw 1 card from the bottom of R&D. trash: Search R&D or Archives for an agenda and reveal it. Shuffle the rest of R&D if you searched it. Add the agenda to the bottom of R&D.

printed_text:
The Runner has 1 fewer [click] to spend during his or her turn.
If Victoria Jenkins is trashed while being accessed, add her to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner has 1 fewer click to spend during his or her turn. If Victoria Jenkins is trashed while being accessed, add her to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.

flavor: "They're gonna try and make you a star. Whether you want it or not." -MaxX
printed_text:
When you rez Reality Threedee, take 1 bad publicity.
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] (or 2[credit] if the Runner is tagged).
stripped_printed_text: When you rez Reality Threedee, take 1 bad publicity. When your turn begins, gain 1 credit (or 2 credits if the Runner is tagged).

printed_text:
If Archangel is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
If you pay 3[credit] when the Runner accesses Archangel, he or she immediately encounters it. Ignore this ability if Archangel is accessed from Archives.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 6</trace> If successful, add 1 installed Runner card to his or her grip.
stripped_printed_text: If Archangel is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. If you pay 3 credits when the Runner accesses Archangel, he or she immediately encounters it. Ignore this ability if Archangel is accessed from Archives. Subroutine Trace 6 If successful, add 1 installed Runner card to his or her grip.

flavor: "Most reporting these days can be done by AI. We just need the talent for the name recognition."
printed_text: If a current is active, News Hound gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines. [subroutine] Trace 3 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: If a current is active, News Hound gains "Subroutine End the run." after all its other subroutines. Subroutine Trace 3 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: "In the Olden Times, a 'resistor' was a vital component of practically all electronic equipment. You know, back when dinosaurs roamed the Earth." -Chaos Theory
printed_text:
Resistor has +1 strength for each tag the Runner has.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, end the run.
stripped_printed_text: Resistor has +1 strength for each tag the Runner has. Subroutine Trace 4 If successful, end the run.

flavor: "If I didn't know better, I'd say they got the better end of that deal." -John Masanori
printed_text: [subroutine] The Corp gains 5[credit]. Trash Special Offer.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Corp gains 5 credits. Trash Special Offer.

flavor: //tl;dr duplicate the subs on the next piece of ice
printed_text: [subroutine] When the Runner encounters the next piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each subroutine on it (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of the encounter.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine When the Runner encounters the next piece of ice during this run, that ice gains a second copy of each subroutine on it (after the original subroutine) for the remainder of the encounter.

flavor: "Stay out of the fast lanes! If speed's your only concern, you're already tagged and halfway to fragged." -g00ru
printed_text:
When the Runner encounters Turnpike, he or she loses 1[credit].
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 5</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters Turnpike, he or she loses 1 credit. Subroutine Trace 5 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: The only thing worse than bad news...
printed_text:
As an additional cost to play 24/7 News Cycle, forfeit an agenda.
Resolve the "when scored" ability on an agenda in your score area.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play 24/7 News Cycle, forfeit an agenda. Resolve the "when scored" ability on an agenda in your score area.

printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Install and rez (paying all costs) X advertisements from Archives and/or HQ, if able.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Install and rez (paying all costs) X advertisements from Archives and/or HQ, if able.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Choose an agenda in the Runner's score area. Media Blitz gains the text of that agenda.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. Choose an agenda in the Runner's score area. Media Blitz gains the text of that agenda.

flavor: "Only with perfect information can we develop the perfect strategy." -The Playbook
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash all resources. The Runner can remove 1 bad publicity to prevent this.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash all resources. The Runner can remove 1 bad publicity to prevent this.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner must spend credits first for each trace attempt during a run.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner must spend credits first for each trace attempt during a run.

flavor: "We use ice on our servers. More runners should ice their own rigs."
printed_text: [trash], remove 1 tag: Trash 1 program. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
stripped_printed_text: trash, remove 1 tag: Trash 1 program. Use this ability only during a run on this server.

flavor: To the worlds sitting on the couch and watching threedee, Rutherford District might as well be all of New Angeles.
printed_text: The base trace strength of each trace during a run on this server is increased by 2. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: The base trace strength of each trace during a run on this server is increased by 2. Limit 1 region per server.

flavor: "Corporations are made up of people. It's ridiculous to think they'd be either all good or all bad." -Sunny Lebeau
printed_text: Global Food Initiative is worth 1 fewer agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
stripped_printed_text: Global Food Initiative is worth 1 fewer agenda point while in the Runner's score area.

printed_text:
Place 6[credit] from the bank on Launch Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Launch Campaign, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from Launch Campaign.
stripped_printed_text: Place 6 credits from the bank on Launch Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Launch Campaign, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2 credits from Launch Campaign.

flavor: Bounce rate is a well-understood measure of ice strength. But it is not the only measure.
printed_text:
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 5</trace> If successful, do 3 net damage.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, trash 1 program.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace 5 If successful, do 3 net damage. Subroutine Trace 4 If successful, trash 1 program.

printed_text: You cannot install non-virtual resources. When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from your grip facedown.
stripped_printed_text: You cannot install non-virtual resources. When your turn begins, you may install 1 card from your grip facedown.

printed_text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D and Archives this turn.
Trash all installed Corp cards. Turn all installed Runner cards facedown.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ, R&D and Archives this turn. Trash all installed Corp cards. Turn all installed Runner cards facedown.

printed_text: Make a run. Once during this run, when you pass a piece of ice, you may trash a number of your installed cards equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, trash that ice.
stripped_printed_text: Make a run. Once during this run, when you pass a piece of ice, you may trash a number of your installed cards equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, trash that ice.

flavor: "Meantime the hellish tattoo of the heart increased. It grew quicker and quicker, and louder and louder every instant." -Edgar Allan Poe
printed_text: +1[mu] Trash an installed card: Prevent 1 damage. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Trash an installed card: Prevent 1 damage. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: "I've been monitoring the anomaly's activity across the New Angeles Pacifica and Andea trunk lines and associated nodes. I have yet to detect a predictable pattern or even to formulate a theory as to the anomaly's nature." -Joséo Greene, SYNC Analyst
printed_text: Interface → Trash 1 installed card: Break 1 "[subroutine] End the run." subroutine.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> Trash 1 installed card: Break 1 "Subroutine End the run." subroutine.

printed_text: [interrupt] → When this program would be trashed, turn it facedown instead of adding it to your heap. (It is still considered trashed.) Errata from CR 1.4
stripped_printed_text: Interrupt -> When this program would be trashed, turn it facedown instead of adding it to your heap. (It is still considered trashed.) Errata from CR 1.4

flavor: "There's parts of the Network now that are different from how they used to be. I can't put my finger on it; just something twitching at my ganglion through my BMI." -Reeve
printed_text:
Once per turn, prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice.
[trash]: Install the top 3 cards of your stack facedown.
stripped_printed_text: Once per turn, prevent a "when encountered" ability on a piece of ice. trash: Install the top 3 cards of your stack facedown.

flavor: Data goes in. Nothing comes out.
printed_text: The first time each turn you trash 1 of your installed cards, gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you trash 1 of your installed cards, gain 1 credit.

printed_text: You start the game with 3 different directive cards installed (these cards are not considered part of your deck).
stripped_printed_text: You start the game with 3 different directive cards installed (these cards are not considered part of your deck).

flavor: Adam raised the hammer. He was free.
printed_text: Trash up to 5 of your installed cards. Draw 1 card for each card trashed (or 2 cards for each card trashed if you trashed at least 1 directive).
stripped_printed_text: Trash up to 5 of your installed cards. Draw 1 card for each card trashed (or 2 cards for each card trashed if you trashed at least 1 directive).

printed_text: +X[mu] Your maximum hand size is increased by X. X is equal to the number of agenda points you have. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +X mu Your maximum hand size is increased by X. X is equal to the number of agenda points you have. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: Bioroids have two brains running in parallel, each capable of running sophisticated programming. There are certain advantages to the setup.
printed_text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to pay for using programs.
stripped_printed_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to pay for using programs.

flavor: The Second Directive requires a bioroid to complete its primary function above all other considerations, save the First Directive.
printed_text: The first [click] you spend each turn must be spent to play a run event or take the basic action to run a server. Lose [click][click]: Break 1 subroutine on the ice you are encountering. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: The first click you spend each turn must be spent to play a run event or take the basic action to run a server. Lose click click: Break 1 subroutine on the ice you are encountering. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: "You look tore up, kid. Have a seat, I'll fire up the arc welder."
printed_text: When your turn begins, choose one of your installed cards. The text box of that card is blank for the remainder of the turn.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, choose one of your installed cards. The text box of that card is blank for the remainder of the turn.

flavor: The Third Directive requires a bioroid to preserve its ability to function and report frequently to Haas-Bioroid for repairs and updates.
printed_text:
The first time each turn you access a card with a trash cost, reveal it. You must trash that card by paying its trash cost, if able.
Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you access a card with a trash cost, reveal it. You must trash that card by paying its trash cost, if able. Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.

flavor: The First Directive forbids a bioroid from harming, or through inaction allowing harm to befall, a human being.
printed_text:
Your maximum hand size is reduced by 2.
When your turn ends, draw 1 card if you do not have cards in your grip equal to or greater than your maximum hand size.
stripped_printed_text: Your maximum hand size is reduced by 2. When your turn ends, draw 1 card if you do not have cards in your grip equal to or greater than your maximum hand size.

flavor: "Mommy will be home soon, sweetie. She has to kick some ass first."
Fortunately, Globalsec buys them by the case.
printed_text: [trash]: Choose an icebreaker (or any number of cloud icebreakers). Each chosen icebreaker has +1 strength for each [link] you have for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.
stripped_printed_text: trash: Choose an icebreaker (or any number of cloud icebreakers). Each chosen icebreaker has +1 strength for each link you have for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.

printed_text: +1[mu] +1[link] Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may force the Corp to "trace 5 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run. If unsuccessful, the Runner bypasses the currently encountered ice." Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu +1 link Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may force the Corp to "trace 5 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run. If unsuccessful, the Runner bypasses the currently encountered ice." Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: Bigger.
printed_text: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of code gate subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of code gate subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength.

flavor: Badder.

stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of sentry subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength.

flavor: Boom.

stripped_printed_text: If you have at least 2 link, the memory cost of this program is 0 mu, even if it is not installed. Interface -> 2 credits: Break any number of barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +3 strength.

flavor: She approached the server, flashed her credentials, and passed straight through. She wondered what it said about her that doing things the legal way felt like cheating.
printed_text:
Install only if you have at least 2[link].
When your turn begins, you may lose [click]. If you do, look at the top card of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Install only if you have at least 2 link. When your turn begins, you may lose click. If you do, look at the top card of R&D.

flavor: "I got an early start today...or maybe I forgot to go home last night."

Reduce the cost to install Jak Sinclair by 1 for each [link] you have.
When your turn begins, you may make a run. You cannot use programs during this run.
stripped_printed_text: Reduce the cost to install Jak Sinclair by 1 for each link you have. When your turn begins, you may make a run. You cannot use programs during this run.

flavor: "Are you crazy? We can't send in prisec until the media gets bored and goes home."
printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp's identity text box is blank.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp's identity text box is blank.

flavor: She tried to remember who he was. Not that it mattered anymore.

stripped_printed_text: Shuffle your stack. Trash the top card of your stack. Gain X credits where X is equal to the install cost of that card.

flavor: Technically correct: the best kind of correct.

Whenever you install a piece of hardware or a program, place 1[credit] from the bank on Technical Writer.
[click],[trash]: Take all credits from Technical Writer.
